Description: Redware pottery dish with a shallow foot and convex sides expanding to the rim(chipped), the interior is inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs including the name of Amun-Ra and an epithet and black painted Hieratic script and decorated with a representation of Amun-Ra traced in black paint.
Bibliographic references: Taylor 2010 / Journey through the afterlife: Ancient Egyptian Book of the Dead (no. 17)
Vleeming 2015 / Demotic graffiti and other short texts gathered from many publications (no.2251, p.451)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2010 4th Nov-2011 6th March, Round Reading Room BM, Book of the Dead 2013, Apr - Jul, Paris, Louvre, L'Art Du Contour 2013/2014, Sept - Jan, Musée royaux d’art et d’histoire, Brussels, L'Art Du Contour
